subject: Interview with Kent Beck
msgSnippet: Dear Moderator, In my quest for a robust testing framework, I chanced to read this excellent
messageBody:
Dear Moderator,

In my quest for a robust testing framework, I chanced to read this excellent
interview<http://www.eclipsemag.net/ecm/ecmcolumns/psecom,id,4,nodeid,6.html>with
Kent Beck in the Eclipse
Magazine <http://www.eclipsemag.net/>. I am fascinated by Kent Beck's
insights on the possibilities that this framework holds in the future. I am
hooked, which is why I want to be a part of this excellent group. BTW: you
may also want to recommend Kent's interview as a read for the rest of the
members on this group. They can download the magazine, free of cost, from
here: http://www.eclipsemag.net/ecm/ecmservices/psecom,id,5,nodeid,4.html

Regards,
Carol

~In every work of genius we recognize our own rejected thoughts; they come
back to us with a certain alienated majesty.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
